name: I-Oh's Adventure
description:
Made for KO Slam Jam 2023 (Themes: Slam [Artistic])!! We are really glad to present you our first project! 

We are programmers and artists around 15-16 years old, we're really proud of our game and we hope you like it too :) If you want to, feel free to share and support!!

Controls: 

WASD - walk 

SPACE / Up- interact 

1ts Puzzle solution: yellow, not red, red, not yellow, not blue, blue (the order that oscillates in the claw at the top-left corner)

Contact:

Programmer: Enobledoid#3296 

Artist: mismagius#5168 

Music: lrvloob#4557
